Posts.Content: I would like to share a site that was designed for women who have had their lives affected by breast cancer. At www.The-Mastectomy-Store.com  You will be able to find special lotions and soaps that can be used through treatments, feminine bra's, breast forms, hats, pink ribbon accessories, clothing, and compression garments. You can also call them with any questions M-F 9am-5pm and talk with women who are breast cancer survivors. I hope this message is able to help you. God Bless. :)
Posts.Title: Mastectomy Products

Posts.Content: www.The-Mastectomy-Store.com is a great site!! :) On 1/10/2008 Tumor wrote:  I googled "Breast Cancer Camisole", found a host of websites. Hope this helps. Take care. Beverly  On 1/7/2008 roofrat63 wrote: Hi this is Susan. Its the 7th now and past her surgery date. i pray all went well. Joining support groups with other BC women really helped me and to this day I still do 2 groups. In our group we have a women getting ready for a double mastectomy. I too would love to know the brand of the cammy you got your friend. warm regards Susan
Posts.Title: breast cancer camisole
